app_text.title: twitto.gr
app_text.subtitle: real time dashboard of tweets in Greece
app_text.about: Twitto.gr is a live dashboard providing analytics about the tweets geolocated in Greece. The data you're seeing is what is happening right now on twitter, it's real real-time.

app_meta.title: Twitto.gr - realtime tweets dashboard
app_meta.description: Twitto.gr is a live dashboard providing analytics about the tweets geolocated in Greece. Curious about what's being tweeted right now? Come have a look
app_meta.description_502: Twitto.gr is temporarily unavailable - please try again in a few seconds

tweet_text.daily_stats: Over the past 24 hours, Greece sent $1 tweets > https://twitto.gr
